title: Misery Loves Company feat. Hrishikesh Hirway, Joshua Malina & Samin Nosrat
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Samin Nosrat (Salt Fat Acid Heat, Home Cooking), Hrishikesh Hirway (Home Cooking, Song Exploder), and Josh Malina (The West Wing, Chutzpod) star in this Ukrainian and Polish tale about what happens when misery loves company so much, it actually comes to life.
